channel.title: Frequent crashes (kernel panic) using debian stable + backports
channel.description: Actually I have been noticing frequent crashes (kernel panic) although I am not certain if this is directly attributed to the Virtual Machines / backports. Does anyone else experience this problem?

item.title: Frequent crashes (kernel panic) using debian stable + backports
item.dc:creator: gh0st66
item.description:
I have confirmed that this is not directly attributed to KVM or KVM backports. Will report back when I learn more

EDIT: this seems to have to do with grsecurity patched kernel

item.title: Frequent crashes (kernel panic) using debian stable + backports
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Off topic: Never saw a kernel panic using Linux ever fingers crossed.

I am not sure of your reasons for this. More information is needed to know why.
